name: sardis
description: Enable AI agents to execute secure payments with Financial Hallucination Prevention - The Payment OS for the Agent Economy

SARDIS_API_KEY.description: Your Sardis API key. Optional for demo/simulated mode.

SARDIS_WALLET_ID.description: Default wallet ID to use for operations

SARDIS_AGENT_ID.description: Agent ID for this MCP connection

SARDIS_MODE.description: Operating mode - 'live' for real transactions, 'simulated' for testing

tools.name: sardis_get_wallet
tools.description: Get wallet details and configuration including balance, policy, and metadata

tools.name: sardis_get_balance
tools.description: Get current wallet balance and spending limits (daily/monthly remaining)

tools.name: sardis_create_wallet
tools.description: Create a new MPC wallet with optional spending policy

tools.name: sardis_update_wallet_policy
tools.description: Update the spending policy for a wallet (limits, allowed vendors, etc.)

tools.name: sardis_list_wallets
tools.description: List all wallets, optionally filtered by agent or status

tools.name: sardis_pay
tools.description: Execute a secure payment with policy validation. Returns virtual card details if approved.

tools.name: sardis_get_transaction
tools.description: Get transaction status and details by transaction ID

tools.name: sardis_list_transactions
tools.description: List recent transactions for a wallet with optional filters

tools.name: sardis_check_policy
tools.description: Check if a payment would be allowed before executing (dry run)

tools.name: sardis_validate_limits
tools.description: Validate spending against daily and monthly limits

tools.name: sardis_check_compliance
tools.description: Check vendor against compliance rules and blocklists

tools.name: sardis_create_hold
tools.description: Create a pre-authorization hold on funds (reserve without charging)

tools.name: sardis_capture_hold
tools.description: Capture a previously created hold (complete the transaction)

tools.name: sardis_void_hold
tools.description: Void/cancel a hold without capturing (release the funds)

tools.name: sardis_get_hold
tools.description: Get hold status and details by hold ID

tools.name: sardis_list_holds
tools.description: List active holds for a wallet

tools.name: sardis_extend_hold
tools.description: Extend the expiration of a hold

tools.name: sardis_create_agent
tools.description: Create a new AI agent with identity and capabilities

tools.name: sardis_get_agent
tools.description: Get agent details and capabilities by agent ID

tools.name: sardis_list_agents
tools.description: List all agents in the organization

tools.name: sardis_update_agent
tools.description: Update agent configuration and capabilities

tools.name: sardis_issue_card
tools.description: Issue a virtual card linked to a wallet for payments

tools.name: sardis_get_card
tools.description: Get virtual card details (card number is masked for security)

tools.name: sardis_list_cards
tools.description: List all virtual cards for a wallet

tools.name: sardis_freeze_card
tools.description: Temporarily freeze a virtual card (blocks all transactions)

tools.name: sardis_unfreeze_card
tools.description: Unfreeze a previously frozen card (resume transactions)

tools.name: sardis_cancel_card
tools.description: Permanently cancel a virtual card

tools.name: sardis_fund_wallet
tools.description: Fund a wallet from bank account, wire transfer, or card

tools.name: sardis_withdraw_to_bank
tools.description: Withdraw funds from wallet to a bank account

tools.name: sardis_get_funding_status
tools.description: Check status of a funding transfer

tools.name: sardis_get_withdrawal_status
tools.description: Check status of a withdrawal

tools.name: sardis_request_approval
tools.description: Request human approval for payments exceeding limits or requiring review

tools.name: sardis_get_approval_status
tools.description: Check status of a pending approval request

tools.name: sardis_get_spending_summary
tools.description: Get spending summary with totals, limits, and trends

tools.name: sardis_get_spending_by_vendor
tools.description: Get spending breakdown by vendor/merchant

tools.name: sardis_get_spending_by_category
tools.description: Get spending breakdown by category (SaaS, Cloud, API, etc.)
